fields.name: ID
fields.title: Identification reference
fields.description: Identification number of the meta-analytic study

fields.name: Reference
fields.description: Complete bibliographic reference of the meta-analytical study
fields.title: Complete bibliographic reference

fields.name: Studies
fields.title: Number of studies
fields.description: Number of original studies included in the meta-analytic study

fields.name: Subjects
fields.title: Number of subjects
fields.description: Total number of subjects (from all original studies) included in the meta-analytic study

fields.name: Foci
fields.title: Number of foci
fields.description: Total number of activation foci (from all original studies) included in the meta-analytic study

fields.name: Technique
fields.title: Neuroimaging technique
fields.description: Neuroimaging technique used in the meta-analytical study

fields.name: ID
fields.description: Identification number of the meta-analytic study
fields.title: Identification reference

fields.name: CognitiveProcess
fields.title: Cognitive process of interest
fields.description: Cognitive process of interest studied in the meta-analysis

fields.name: Seed
fields.title: Seed tag
fields.description: Anatomical label of the seed region chosen a priori

fields.name: MicroAnat
fields.description: Name of the microanatomical region identified  using the JuBrain Anatomy Toolbox (https://github.com/inm7/jubrain-anatomy-toolbox)
fields.title: Microanatomical region

fields.name: Probabilty
fields.title: Probability
fields.description: Probability of the seed region to occupy the location of the microanatomical region identified in the MicroAnat column based on the combination of probabilistic cytoarchitectonic maps and functional imaging data.

name: asj18cerebcortex
title: ASJ+18CerebCortex
description: This Data Package includes tabular data from the publication "Computing the Social Brain Connectome Across Systems and States" (https://doi.org/10.1093/cercor/bhx121).
